GSD.description:
lockdown: also lock down previous kgdb use

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.42 by commit 69c5d307dce1560fafcb852f39d7a1bf5e266641. For more details please see the references link.
